alert.note: Alert for La Paz; Yuma (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 15 at 5:35PM MST until March 15 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MST FOR SOUTHWESTERN LA PAZ AND NORTH CENTRAL YUMA COUNTIES... At 535 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of Yuma Proving Ground, or 22 miles northeast of Martinez Lake, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Palm Canyon. This includes AZ Route 95 between mile markers 68 and 82. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
